name: Path Puzzler
description:
Welcome to "Path Puzzler"!

In this game, you will be helping the owner of a lost shovel to reunite with their beloved tool. You will be controlling both the owner and the shovel simultaneously using either the WASD or arrow keys. Your task is to guide them both through various obstacles and puzzles in order to reach their destination.

The game is set up as a series of levels, each one with its own unique challenges and puzzles to solve. As you progress through the levels, the difficulty will increase, requiring you to use your problem-solving skills and strategic thinking to overcome obstacles and reach your goal.

Remember, you must control both the owner and the shovel together, so make sure to pay attention to both of them and avoid getting either one stuck or lost along the way.

Are you ready to embark on this exciting adventure and help reunite the owner with their shovel? Play now and let the fun begin!

Duration of development: approximately one day.

We are proud to present this game created by Ariel Vainer and Ben Lightstone using Python and the Pygame framework. Our goal was to create an engaging puzzle game that combines strategy and planning ahead, centered around a shovel and a character working together to overcome obstacles.

We hope you enjoy playing this game as much as we enjoyed making it.
